name: Monowave
storyline: Play as Mono, a guardian spirit protecting the four Emotions of the realm: Anxiety, Anger, Sorrow, and Happiness. One day, the Emotions escape, and their unchecked powers explode into a wave of chaos that warps everything—even the Emotions themselves. Determined to set things right, Mono begins a tumultuous journey towards their new lairs…
summary: Monowave is a whimsical puzzle-adventure platformer about the transformative power of emotions. Explore beautiful landscapes and empathize with its quirky denizens to restore harmony in an emotionally turbulent universe.
